c1.name: A Comrade's Duty
c1.effect:
When a character protected by Thoma's own **Blazing Barrier** (Thoma excluded) is attacked, Thoma's own **Blazing Blessing** CD is decreased by 3s, while his own **Crimson Ooyoroi**'s CD is decreased by 3s.
This effect can be triggered once every 20s.

c3.name: Fortified Resolve
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Blazing Blessing** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Long-Term Planning
c4.effect: After using **Crimson Ooyoroi**, 15 Energy will be restored to Thoma.

c5.name: Raging Wildfire
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Crimson Ooyoroi** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Burning Heart
c6.effect: When a **Blazing Barrier** is obtained or refreshed, the DMG dealt by all party members' Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attacks is increased by 15% for 6s.
